ISSUE.TITLE: Add confirm dialog for project delete
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently project deletes instantly on clicking delete icon which is really dangerous. Add a confirm dialog to confirm the deletion of project.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: disable column attribute edit in SQLite Enabled column rename and disabled column attribute update if database is SQLite re #252 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat(gui): add confirm dialog for project operations Added confirm dialog for project delete,start,restart and stop operations closes #255 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>
